io.delta.kernel

Interface Scan


  • public interface Scan
    An object representing a scan of a Delta table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression getRemainingPredicate()
      Get the remaining predicate the Delta Kernel can not guarantee the data returned by it satisfies the predicate.
      CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> getScanFiles(TableClient tableClient)
      Get an iterator of data files to scan.
      Row getScanState(TableClient tableClient)
      Get the scan state associate with the current scan.

    • Method Detail

      • getScanFiles

        CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> getScanFiles(TableClient tableClient)
        Get an iterator of data files to scan.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - TableClient instance to use in Delta Kernel.
        Returns:
        data in ColumnarBatch batch format. Each row correspond to one scan file.

      • getRemainingPredicate

        Expression getRemainingPredicate()
        Get the remaining predicate the Delta Kernel can not guarantee the data returned by it satisfies the predicate. This filter is used by Delta Kernel to do data skipping whenever possible.
        Returns:
        Remaining predicate as Expression.

      • getScanState

        Row getScanState(TableClient tableClient)
        Get the scan state associate with the current scan. This state is common to all survived files.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - TableClient instance to use in Delta Kernel.
        Returns:
        Scan state in Row format.
